div.p: I get into work about 9:30am, open up, turn all the boilers on. We open at 10:00am so I’ve got half an hour to clean the building down
make sure everything is running smoothly, make sure all our stock is in place and slowly get ready to serve our customers.
You know most of my job is just customer service so it’s just having a wilful ear and listening to what the customer wants and making their day better
